name: Halloween Layered Dip 🥗
description: If you're looking for a festive and flavorful appetizer, this Halloween layered dip is sure to be a hit. It's loaded with all your favorites, and it's ideal for dipping!
instructions: In a bowl, mix the beans and salsa.
Spread the bean mixture onto a plate. Spread the guacamole over the beans.
Put the sour cream in a plastic bag. Cut off the end of one corner of the bag.
Pipe out a bullseye pattern of sour cream over the guacamole.
Run a toothpick through the sour cream from the center outward, until it looks like a spiderweb.
Garnish the border of the dip with lettuce, tomatoes, and black olives. Serve with tortilla chips.
